name: Christopher H. GRAHAM, Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Appellant

parties: Christopher H. GRAHAM, Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of March, 2003, the order of the Court of Common Pleas for the 59th Judicial District, Elk County Branch, is hereby REVERSED. Wroblewski v. Com., Dep’t of Transportation, 570 Pa. 249, 809 A.2d 247 (2002). The matter is hereby REMANDED for further proceedings. Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
817 A.2d 478
Christopher H. GRAHAM, Appellee v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF TRANSPORTATION, BUREAU OF DRIVER LICENSING, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 6, 2003.
